pr_title: New module for user virtual attribute sponsoredMembershipInOrganizations

timeline.message:
New module for user virtual attribute sponsoredMembershipInOrganizations

 - new module for user virtual attribute which return list of all values
 of group attribute sponsorOrganizationIdentifier in every group where
 user has valid member (is active - valid in group and vo).
 - add simple test for module
